Lyric:
[by:我不是字母]
[00:43.500]Cause we got wasted, we got wasted
[00:48.080]And we chased it, we chased it
[00:52.450]Cause we got wasted, we got wasted all the time
[00:56.830]And we chased it, we chased it all night
[01:01.250]Cause we got wasted, we got wasted all the time
[01:05.600]And we chased it, we chased it
[01:10.860]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[01:15.220]Don't give it up, don't give it up to care
[01:19.380]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[01:24.070]Don't give it up, don't give it up someday
[01:53.740]Cause everyone I'll see
[01:55.890]And everyone I'll know
[01:58.040]They don't care for the places that we go
[02:02.320]Cause we got wasted, we got wasted all the time
[02:06.720]And we chased it, we chased it all night
[02:11.010]Cause we got wasted, we got wasted all the time
[02:15.310]And we chased it, we chased it
[02:37.640]We've been running for days without no sleep
[02:41.600]Just to find all the faces in the street
[02:45.930]We've been running for days without no sleep
[02:50.270]Just to find what it is
[02:55.640]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[03:00.050]Don't give it up, don't give it up to care
[03:04.390]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[03:08.740]Don't give it up, don't give it up someday
[03:13.220]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[03:17.530]Don't give it up, don't give it up to care
[03:21.840]Been trying to work out what we did just the other day
[03:26.250]Don't give it up, don't give it up someday
[03:29.830]
